name: Marvin Minsky
field: Cognitive science ,  Computer science ,  Artificial intelligence ,  Philosophy of mind

thesis_title: Theory of Neural-Analog Reinforcement Systems and Its Application to the Brain Model Problem

prizes: Turing Award (1969) Japan Prize (1990) IJCAI Award for Research Excellence (1991) Benjamin Franklin Medal (Franklin Institute)
